author: Staff Reporter
text:
Voters’ facilitation centres have been opened at all taluk offices in Kanyakumari district, RDO office in Nagercoil, Padmanabhapuram Sub-Collector’s office and the Collectorate to provide election-related assistance and issue Electoral Photo ID Cards to voters on payment of Rs. 25.

Those who apply for the EPIC cards will get them within two weeks, according to a press release issued by District Election Officer and Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan.

All those above the age of 18 years could check whether their names were in the voters’ list from these centres.

They could also use the centres for applying online for inclusion of name, change of address and incorporating other corrections. They could use the centres to apply for duplicate EPIC.

The people could lodge election-related complaints with Election Control Room functioning at the Collector’s Office through toll-free number 1800 599 8101, toll-free Income Tax Office number 1800 425 6661 and District Police Office number 04652 224004, the release added.
title: Voters’ facilitation centres opened at taluk offices
